channel.title: Insolidarity is DEAD - Peregrihn BandCamp is up
channel.description:
If you're reading this, hi! I'm Peregrihn. I exist out of the ashes of what was once Insolidarity. I come to bring you a new take on his *style* (if you can call 'not having a style' a style). You can expect a change in style resulting in slower and more pulsating -wave creations steming from chillwave/vaporwave influences. True outrun and the vibe from that may be incorporated as well, we'll see how things go... For now, If you for whatever odd reason liked any of Insolidarity's creations, they still exist on Spotify under Insolidarity and in a private soundcloud "Legacy Playlist" linked in My bio and here as well:
https://soundcloud.com/peregrihn/sets/what-led-to-now/s-ZMNul
I hope to see abright future where this community helps me grow exponentially
Also, I have just put out some of my demos publicly for criticism and preview for my upcoming Debut, feel free to check them out at my new soundcloud:
https://soundcloud.com/peregrihn
(P.S. If you already followed Insolidarity, no worries, its the same account so the followers carried over)

item.title: Insolidarity is DEAD - Peregrihn BandCamp is up
item.dc:creator: Peregrihn
item.description:
I’d like to inform you guys that I’ve just set up my Bandcamp profile for independant distribution of my music. If anyone is interested and would like to monetarily support my music, just follow this link: peregrihn.bandcamp.com
btw thanks @icsleepers and @blakkaz for pointing out the many pros for using Bandcamp

Read full topic
